scripts.build:shared: cd shared && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:koa: npm run build:shared && cd koa && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:lambdas: npm run build:shared && cd lambdas && npm install && npm run build
scripts.lint: cd shared && npm run lint && cd ../koa && npm run lint && cd ../lambdas && npm run lint
scripts.test: cd shared && npm run test && cd ../koa && npm run test && cd ../lambdas && npm run test
scripts.deploy: npm run build:lambdas && cd lambdas && npm run deploy
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:koa
scripts.start:dev: npm run build && concurrently "npm run start:koa" "npm run start:lambdas"
